posts.title: Military Grade Lensatic Sighting Compass
posts.content: Avoid getting lost while you’re trekking through the wilderness by heading out with this military grade lensatic sighting compass. This high quality compass features a thermo-elastic capsule with a floating dial, rotating bezel, and a rugged die-cast body.

posts.title: The 1990s Coloring Book
posts.content: Relive the glorious decade that brought us dial-up internet and cinematic masterpieces like Clueless with the 1990s coloring book. Every page comes jam packed with iconic pictures of all the phat movies, shows and products that made the ’90s so rad.

posts.title: Creepy Horse Head Squirrel Feeder
posts.content: Get a good laugh while you do your part to help the local wildlife with the creepy horse head squirrel feeder. Once the squirrel peeks its fuzzy little head for a quick meal, the feeder’s peculiar shape makes it seem as if he’s wearing a hilarious horse mask.

posts.title: No Spill Vertical Ice Cube Tray
posts.content: Utilize the limited space in your freezer more efficiently by making your ice cubes using this no spill vertical tray. The tray comes with an odorless and spill-proof silicone lid that allows you to store it vertically inside a crowded freezer without worrying about spills.

posts.title: Chalkboard Wall Paint
posts.content: Now you can transform any plain wall into a chalkboard just like you had in school! Simply apply the chalkboard wall paint like you would a traditional wall paint and when it dries you’ll have a genuine chalkboard to write and draw on.

posts.title: Star Wars Powerbot Robot Vacuum
posts.content: Ensure your home is the cleanest in the entire galaxy by placing the Star Wars Powerbot robot vacuum on the job. It boasts 10 watts of suction power, features a design that minimizes clogging, and comes with an onboard speaker that mimics Vader’s breathing.

posts.title: Hidden Flask Mittens
posts.content: Battle the cold by staying warm in more ways than one using these hidden flasks mittens. Apart from shielding your fingers from the frigid weather, the left hand mitten comes equipped with a discreet three ounce flask you can sip from your thumb.

posts.title: Spiral Hot Dog Slicer
posts.content: Give your plain dogs a delicious gourmet touch using this spiral hot dog slicer. This easy to operate utensil slices up your plump dog into a meaty spiral so that it cooks evenly inside and out while it’s roasting over your grill top.

posts.title: Bonnets For Cats
posts.content: Keep your prideful kitty in check and looking respectable by covering up her ears with one of these bonnets for cats. Made from 100% cotton with satin lining, the bonnets feature a quaint floral print and come with straps to ensure a secure fit.

posts.title: Skull Ice Cube Mold
posts.content: Chill your drink like a total badass using the skull ice cube mold. This ominous ice mold is shaped like a giant skull and is ideal for creating bone-chilling drinks. Due to its unusually large size, just one ice skull is all you’ll need to enjoy icy drinks the entire night.

posts.title: Adhesive Measuring Tape
posts.content: Have you ever tried doing repairs at home all by yourself? If so, you know just how difficult it can be to measure something while attempting to hold the tape as you mark down the spot. The adhesive measuring tape will finally solve this problem once and for all.

posts.title: Star Wars Electronic Chewbacca Mask
posts.content: Transform yourself into your favorite Wookie by dressing up in this Star Wars electronic Chewbacca mask. It features a detailed movie-like design, comes with a strap for easy adjustments, and makes classic roaring sounds that amplify as you open your mouth.
